author: AETerry
title: Halloween Ghost Review
review:
My daughter got this in her Christmas stocking for 2010.... Grandparents clearly forgot to give these little mini sets to us at Halloween and making up for it later.

 

It's a simple little set, quick and easy to build. It was still a bit too advanced for my daughter as she's not at the stage of follow picture directions with Legos yet. That was alright, she had a lot of fun after words playing with it once I had it put together for her.

 

Like the Pumpkin set that I got, this set is pretty much a decorative display set and not too much you can do for play. And if you're looking for extra pieces, this is a way to get some and have a small bit of fun.
